casebody.data:
COMERICA BANK, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
PARS ICE CREAM COMPANY, INC., Van Born Group, LLC, Tumbleweed Group, LLC, Davoud Sadeghi, a/k/a David Sadeghi, Shelley Traywick, Mohammed Sadeghi, Pars Ice Cream California, Inc., Park Phoenix Cash & Carry, Inc., and Montebello BLS, LLC, Defendant,
and
Detroit Real Estate, LLC, Appellant. SC: 159049
COA: 339516 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 18, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.
